advancements.adventure.create_conduit.ti: Breach the depths while nary short of air
advancements.adventure.create_conduit.de: Make you a construction twisted 'round a conduit
advancements.adventure.find_mansion.titl: Overtop the hill, a castle looms
advancements.adventure.loot_buried_treas: And bestow upon thineself the life of the pirate
Find you riches o' plenty 'neath long-lost sands
advancements.adventure.loot_pyramid.desc: Loot and abscond a sandy pyramid... and live to tell the tale
advancements.adventure.loot_monument.des: Taketh many a sponge from an ocean monument
advancements.adventure.trade_max.title: You may find kinship in my enterprises
advancements.adventure.trade_max.descrip: Trade you with a Master of coin
advancements.combat.arbalistic.title: The master of the cross-bow
advancements.combat.arbalistic.descripti: Shooting once well thy cross-bow, take account the demise of five different creatures
advancements.combat.bullseye.title: Bullseye
advancements.combat.bullseye.description: Hitteth the bullseye of a Target block from at least 30 meters hence
Thou great defender of this Capitol
Make the day yours, beat back raiders from a village
advancements.combat.kill_all_mobs.title: Herne the Hunter
advancements.combat.kill_all_mobs.descri: Of every wick'd creature, hunt thee one
advancements.combat.kill_a_mob.title: To slay a monster
advancements.combat.ol_betsy.title: The noise of thy cross-bow
advancements.combat.ol_betsy.description: Loose a shot with thy cross-bow
advancements.combat.root.title: Combat
advancements.combat.root.description: Beat back such wick'd dangers of the night
advancements.combat.shoot_arrow.title: Draw, archers, draw!
advancements.combat.shoot_arrow.descript: Loose thee an arrow towards a target
advancements.combat.sniper_duel.title: I aim a mile beyond the moon
advancements.combat.sniper_duel.descript: Slay thee a restless skeleton from yonder two and half scores
advancements.combat.throw_trident.title: Yea, his dread trident shake
advancements.combat.throw_trident.descri:
Hurl away thy trident with watery fury
Note: Flatter not neptune for his trident
Share ye a single piercing arrow betwixt two Night Hags
advancements.combat.very_very_frightenin: A poor peasant, smite ye with thunder
advancements.combat.voluntary_exile.desc: Kill ye a wild huntsman captain. Take special care around villages, revenge may be sought...
advancements.combat.whos_the_pillager_no: Have at a Wild Hunter the way they might have unto thee
advancements.husbandry.honey_block_slide: Forbear a fatal fall, with a slide o'er honey
advancements.husbandry.obtain_netherite_: Upgrade thy hoe with a Netherite ingot, then remember: to be, or not to be, that is the question
Have I done a good day's work
